headerText: Everything you need to pass your Accountancy and Finance exams is here! 30,000+ students have chosen Learnsignal as their trusted online study partner.
ListTwo: 24/7 tutor support to answer all your questions
providerTitle: Approved Accountancy and Finance Tuition Providers
providerText: An online learning platform accredited by the International ACCA organization 'Silver Learning Partner'
cartaOne: Used by Students and Members from
coursesText: Make learning simple and affordable by studying online in a way that suits your professional and personal life.
accaText: Association of Certified Chartered Accountants ACCA Prepare for ACCA exams with the most comprehensive and up-to-date study resources, including lectures, summaries, practice exams, mentor support and more.
dipIfrText: Diploma in International Financial Reporting Gain the DipIFR qualification by studying courses that include expertly designed lectures, summaries, tests, mock exams, mentor support and more.
stepText: All the ACCA study programs you want are on this platform!
stepDesc: How a student should progress through their course, and as a result through their professional exams.
stepListOneText: Using the videos and associated notes and reading materials (pdf viewer) to attain the required knowledge
stepListTwoText: Using the quiz pages and constructed response tools to practice exam-type questions will reinforce the learning from the attain phase.
stepListThreeText: Within the learning phase of the journey by completing the attain and apply phases in line with guidance and to a high standard students will have achieved the targeted goal of the learning phase.
questionOne: Will I receive a certificate after completing the course?
answerOne: Yes, an 'OLP' branded course completion certificate will be provided!
answerTwo: Of course, our platform is accredited. More at http/
questionThree: Do I need to purchase a textbook or additional materials?
answerThree: No, you don't need them. We provide comprehensive course materials for each course.
answerFour: Since our courses are limited in duration, they will be credited to you for a period of 4 months. After the expiration date, your subscription will be closed!

data.title: Top quality ACCA content
data.text: Comprehensive overview of the courses. Lots of informative videos and practise questions

data.title: EFFECTIVE ,SHORT AND PRECISE LECTURES
data.text: The lectures are short and precise and there is quick responses from tutors whenever you need assistance.Thumps up guys!

data.title: Learn signal was extremely helpful for‚Ä¶
data.text: Learn signal was extremely helpful for my ATX exams. Master classes from tutors were awesome. Each had a different approach but great advice for exam passing. I will continue to use it. Just in the practice platform some exam practise papers were not up to date and did not match up with the solution, so this caused a bit of back and forth. Also it would be helpful for the registered users not having to log in each time with pw. Everything else is great. Thanks for the support, appreciated!

overview.title: Why study {{abbr}} with Learnsignal?
text: Get expert {{abbr}} tuition that covers 100% of the syllabus in a way that‚Äôs simple to learn and makes your exams easier to pass!

{{abbr}} is one of the most popular accounting qualifications. It is made up of three levels: Foundation, Advanced, and Professional, each of which take around a year to complete. There‚Äôs also Bookkeeping, which is a shorter qualification which takes subjects from Foundation and Advanced to create a Bookkeeping qualification.
Registration is now closed for the AQ16 syllabus, so please make sure that you only buy these courses if you are already registered with the {{abbr}}.
Anyone looking to register with the {{abbr}} from 1st September 2022 onwards must register on the new Q2022 syllabus.

study.title: Content developed by experts
study.text: Course content and all other learning materials are carefully designed by our experts.

study.text: Get answers to your questions instantly from our expert tutors, any time you need it.
